import axios from "axios"; import { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./CatAdd.scss"; const origin = "http://localhost:9001"; class CatAdd extends Component { state = { catName: "", age: "", gender: "", breed: "", health: "", personality: "", city: "", contact: "", }; submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post(`${origin}/cats`, this.state) .then((response) => { console.log(response); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }; render() { return (

Age

Breed

Personality

Health

Gender

City

Contact

); } } export default CatAdd;
